text: nice. it would have been great to pair that up from the beginning :slightly_smiling_face:

Our meeting w/ the Autodesk CEO went really well. Had strong representation from Rick, Ken and Sean from Grovemade, and Holly from Madorra. I think we told a compelling story about why Portland is the right place for PMMC and why now is the best moment to do it.
Spoke w/ Kevin afterwards and he thought it went well too.
The next couple of weeks are critical - Autodesk is making their Co-CEO to CEO decision on June 17th. So fingers crossed that Amar gets it!
great update, thx. and maybe we can tour that autodesk building some time soon :slightly_smiling_face:

It’s on the list. There’s now a project manager assigned to help out (Kevin is leaving on sabbatical in a couple of weeks.) I mentioned it at our last meeting that we’d like a tour. (Also going to get renderings and floorplans of the new space to update the pitch deck).
